channel.title: Client FUCKED up
channel.description:
only me can run the client and others get this error :confused:?
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Gui : Unsuppo rted major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14 1) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit.[/code]
this is the run.bat [code]@echo off Title Client cd ./ Java -Xmx1024m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause[/code]
YES i compiled... does any1 have a idea how to fix it? :| EDIT: i first used jdk 7.02 which didnt work after that i used jdk 6.30 which didnt work too:( this is what my compiler says : warning: .\sign\signlink.class: major version 51 is newer than 50, the highest m ajor version supported by this compiler. It is recommended that the compiler be upgraded. Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 warning

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

this is what my compiler says :
warning: .\sign\signlink.class: major version 51 is newer than 50, the highest m
ajor version supported by this compiler.
It is recommended that the compiler be upgraded.
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 warning

Read full topic

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The error says that the class was compiled with JDK7, and you’re trying to run it with Java 6.

Read full topic

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

all above didnt work but when i make a webclient for it like 3 of the 20 players can play on it…
EDIT: i first used jdk 7.02 which didnt work after that i used jdk 6.30 which didnt work too:(

Read full topic

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

You compiled the client with a higher Java version than your players. You must compile with a lower version or have them download the version you compiled with or higher.

Read full topic

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

or change the code to this

Windows 7 CODE:

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\ EDIT TO YOUR VERSION OF JAVA \bin\java.exe"-Xmx1024m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

WINDOWS XP, VISTA CODE:

@echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\ EDIT TO YOUR VERSION OF JAVA\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

k thanks will try.

Read full topic

item.title: Client FUCKED up
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

If i am right I read somewhere that unsupported major.minor version means you need a different java jdk version to be able to run it.
Ask your mates to install the same java jdk as you and let them copy your path.

I don’t know if this works so make sure you have some kind of backup, cause i dont wanna mess it up for u

Read full topic
